# componentInfo

**Instance Property**

An array containing a [doc://com.apple.corevideo/documentation/CoreVideo/CVPlanarComponentInfo] structure for each plane of the buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
var componentInfo: CVPlanarComponentInfo
```
